AT.name: Donkey Kong® 64
AT.description: King K. Rool™ will die DK-Insel erobern und nur Donkey Kong und seine Freunde können ihn aufhalten! Dies ist DKs erstes Abenteuer in 3D, in dem du ihm dabei helfen musst, seine pelzigen Freunde zu retten, die goldenen Bananen zurück zu erobern und seine Heimat zu retten. Steuere nicht nur Donkey Kong und Diddy, sondern außerdem Tiny, Lanky und Chunky Kong. Jeder Affe hat einzigartige Fähigkeiten, wie Tinys Pferdeschwanzwirbler und Chunkys Ananaswerfer. Mit einem gigantischen Einspielermodus voller Überraschungen und dem affig-verrückten Mehrspielermodus ist Donkey Kong 64 ein Fass randvoll mit Abenteuer!

AU.name: Donkey Kong® 64
AU.description: King K. Rool™ has set his sights on conquering Kong Isle, and only Donkey Kong and his pals can save the day! In DK's first 3D adventure, help him rescue his furry friends, reclaim the Golden Bananas and save his homeland. Take control not only of Donkey Kong and Diddy, but also Tiny, Lanky and Chunky Kong. Each character has unique abilities, from Tiny’s Ponytail Twirl to Chunky’s Pineapple Launcher. With a massive single-player quest packed with surprises and a madcap multiplayer mode, Donkey Kong 64 is a bursting barrel of fun!

BG.name: Donkey Kong® 64
BG.description: King K. Rool™ has set his sights on conquering Kong Isle, and only Donkey Kong and his pals can save the day! In DK's first 3D adventure, help him rescue his furry friends, reclaim the Golden Bananas and save his homeland. Take control not only of Donkey Kong and Diddy, but also Tiny, Lanky and Chunky Kong. Each character has unique abilities, from Tiny’s Ponytail Twirl to Chunky’s Pineapple Launcher. With a massive single-player quest packed with surprises and a madcap multiplayer mode, Donkey Kong 64 is a bursting barrel of fun!

BE.name: Donkey Kong® 64
BE.description: King K. Rool™ veut conquérir Kong Isle, et seul Donkey Kong et ses amis peuvent la sauver ! Dans cette première aventure en 3D de DK, aidez-le à sauver ses amis de tous poils, à récupérer les bananes d’or et à sauver sa maison. Ne jouez pas seulement avec Donkey Kong et Diddy. Tiny, Lanky et Chunky Kong sont aussi de la partie ; chacun possédant des capacités particulières, comme Tiny qui fait l'hélicoptère avec ses couettes ou Chunky et son lance-ananas. Grâce à une énorme quête solo pleine de surprise et un mode multijoueur de folie, Donkey Kong 64 est un baril de rigolade explosif !

ES.name: Donkey Kong® 64
ES.description: King K. Rool™ se ha empeñado en conquistar la Isla de Donkey Kong, y ¡ los únicos que pueden impedirlo son Donkey Kong y su panda! Ayuda a DK a rescatar a sus peludos amigos, recuperar los plátanos dorados y mantener su hogar a salvo, en su primera aventura en 3D. No solo podrás jugar con Donkey Kong y Diddy, sino también con Tiny, Lanky y Chunky Kong. Con cada uno de ellos, tendrás habilidades únicas, como el giro de helicóptero de Tiny o el lanzador de piñas de Chunky. Emprende una gran aventura cargada de sorpresas en solitario o únete a la misión en un modo multijugador de locura. ¡Donkey Kong 64 garantiza la diversión más explosiva!

IT.name: Donkey Kong® 64
IT.description: King K. Rool™ ha tutta l'intenzione di conquistare Kong Isle: solo Donkey Kong e compari possono sventare i suoi piani! Nella sua prima avventura in 3D, DK dovrà salvare i suoi amici pelosi, recuperare le banane d'oro e salvare la sua isola! Puoi giocare nei panni di Donkey Kong e Diddy, ma anche di Tiny, Lanky e Chunky Kong. Ciascuno di loro ha le proprie abilità speciali, ad esempio Tiny può roteare con le trecce e Chunky ha un bazooka che spara ananas. Parti per una gigantesca missione per giocatore singolo piena di sorprese o lanciati nella folle modalità multigiocatore. Donkey Kong 64 è un esplosivo barile pieno di divertimento!

NL.name: Donkey Kong® 64
NL.description: King K. Rool™ heeft zijn zinnen gezet op het veroveren van Kong-eiland, en enkel Donkey Kong en zijn behaarde makkers kunnen hem tegenhouden! In dit eerste 3D-avontuur van DK moet hij zijn vrienden bevrijden, gouden bananen terugvorderen en zijn thuisland bevrijden. Speel niet alleen als Donkey Kong, maar als familieleden Diddy, Tiny, Lanky en Chunky. Elk van de primaten is behendig in unieke vaardigheden, zoals de Pony Tail Twirl van Tiny en de Pineapple Launcher van Chunky. Met een enorm avontuur voor één speler en een doldwaze spelstand voor meerdere spelers sta je met Donkey Kong 64 niet voor aap!

NZ.name: Donkey Kong® 64
NZ.description: King K. Rool™ has set his sights on conquering Kong Isle, and only Donkey Kong and his pals can save the day! In DK's first 3D adventure, help him rescue his furry friends, reclaim the Golden Bananas and save his homeland. Take control not only of Donkey Kong and Diddy, but also Tiny, Lanky and Chunky Kong. Each character has unique abilities, from Tiny’s Ponytail Twirl to Chunky’s Pineapple Launcher. With a massive single-player quest packed with surprises and a madcap multiplayer mode, Donkey Kong 64 is a bursting barrel of fun!

PL.name: Donkey Kong® 64
PL.description: King K. Rool™ has set his sights on conquering Kong Isle, and only Donkey Kong and his pals can save the day! In DK's first 3D adventure, help him rescue his furry friends, reclaim the Golden Bananas and save his homeland. Take control not only of Donkey Kong and Diddy, but also Tiny, Lanky and Chunky Kong. Each character has unique abilities, from Tiny’s Ponytail Twirl to Chunky’s Pineapple Launcher. With a massive single-player quest packed with surprises and a madcap multiplayer mode, Donkey Kong 64 is a bursting barrel of fun!

PT.name: Donkey Kong® 64
PT.description: King K. Rool™ tenciona conquistar Kong Isle e Donkey Kong e os seus amigos são os únicos que o podem impedir! Nesta primeira aventura de DK em 3D, ajuda a resgatar os seus amigos peludos, a recuperar as Golden Bananas e a salvar a sua terra natal. Podes jogar não apenas com Donkey Kong e Diddy, mas também com Tiny, Lanky e Chunky Kong. Cada um deles possui habilidades únicas, desde o Ponytail Twirl de Tiny ao Pineapple Launcher de Chunky. Empreende uma grande aventura carregada de surpresas em modo de jogador único ou entra numa missão em modo multijogadores de perder a cabeça. Donkey Kong 64 é um barril a explodir de diversão!

RU.name: Donkey Kong® 64
RU.description: Кинг К. Роль собирается захватить остров Конг, и только команда Донки Конга может противостоять злодею! Это первый трехмерный приключенческий экшн с Донки Конгом в главной роли, где вы поможете ему выручить своих мохнатых друзей, вернуть Золотые бананы и спасти родной остров. Играйте не только за Донки Конга и Дидди, но и за Tiny, Lanky и Chunky Kong — каждого со своими уникальными способностями: от Tiny с ее вращающимися белокурыми хвостиками, до метателя ананасов Chunky. Одиночных игроков ждет полный неожиданностей захватывающий квест, а многопользовательский режим просто не поддается описанию! Donkey Kong 64 — это неиссякаемый поток развлечений!

SE.description: King K. Rool™ has set his sights on conquering Kong Isle, and only Donkey Kong and his pals can save the day!
